mapper.select: SELECT mabc_design_id, crop, if(mabc_status=0,"분석중",if(mabc_status=1,"분석완료","분석실패")) as mabc_status, note, create_date, jobid from mabc_design ORDER BY mabc_design_id DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT into mabc_design(crop, mabc_status, note, create_date, jobid) VALUES(#{crop},0,#{note},NOW(),#{jobid})
